X
Oct. 23d
Hd Qrs Camp
near Grapevine
Perry Co Ky Oct 12th 1863
Governor
To his Excelency.
Sir

The loyal Men of the County of Letcher are anxious to comply with your ^order^ in raiseing the last call of Volunteers in the State of Kentucky But owing ^to^ the invasion in the County of Letcher By the Guarrillers there can not be a Recruiting Station established in there

If the time has not yet expired for for this call the men of that County asks Permission to recruit a Company and establish a Recruiting Station near my Hd Qrs in the co of Perry. Letcher County has not nor can be enrolled on account of Guarrillers u unless the federal forces goes and enforces the enrollment of that County

J, C, Eversole
Major Comdg 3d Batt
14th Ky vol Cav
Ans that the exposed situation of this County -- precludes the idea of organizing State guards within it

Letcher Coy Oct 12/63
J. C. Eversole
Maj 14 Ky Cav
Find it impossible to organize a company in this Coy can they Establish a camp in Perry Co near my Hd Qrs for said Coy
